version_description:
Scan your Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock new games you can’t get anywhere else ‒ Shopkins Shop and Drop game and Rabbids Beach Bwaaah-leyball.
 
Have fun!

Scan your Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock new games you can’t get anywhere else ‒ Shopkins Shop and Drop game and Rabbids Beach Bwaaah-leyball.
 
Have fun!

Scan your HarperCollins Happy Meal Book with McPlay Power to unlock a new Greeting Card Maker just in time for Valentine’s Day - Clark the Shark Takes Heart, Paddington, Happy Valentine’s Day, Mouse!, and Pete the Cat – Valentines Day is Cool.  Have fun!

Scan your Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock new games you can’t get anywhere else ‒ The mysterious Barbie Spy Squad Mission: Fabulous Game and the thrilling Hot Wheels DC SUPER HEROES Adventure Race Game.
Scan your Happy Meal® toy with McPlay Power to unlock games you can’t get anywhere else. Check out the exciting new game emoji Rollout. It’s sure to put a smile on your face. Have fun!

Scan your Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock games you can’t get anywhere else. We have launched 5 fun new Angry Birds Movie games – Save the Eggs, Feathers Will Fly, Eggventure, Red’s Happy Space, and Movie Mix-Up. Have a great time!

Scan your Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock brand new games you can’t get anywhere else ‒ the excitingly action-packed Skylanders Superchargers Tunnel Race game and the amazing Powerpuff Girls Bedtime Rescue game.
Have fun!
Scan your Step It Activity Band Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock four brand new games you can’t get anywhere else – Step It Run Happy Run, Step It Jump Race, and Step It Long Jump.

Scan your Talking Friends Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock a snappy new game you can’t get anywhere else – Talking Tomcat Trampoline.

Have fun!

Scan your Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock brand new games you can’t get anywhere else. Join Justice League heroes Batman, Superman, Plastic Man, and Hawkman in action-packed games of Battle Bumpers. Plus, Supergirl, Bumblebee, Wonder Woman and Batgirl are your allies in the exciting DC Girls games of Super Hero Team-Up.
Scan your It’s the Great Pumpkin Charlie Brown Happy Meal® pail with McPlay® Power to unlock The Great Trick or Treat Game. It’s an awesome new game treat you can’t play anywhere else!
Scan your Trolls Happy Meal® toy with McPlay® Power to unlock Troll-eriffic new games you can’t play anywhere else!

Scan your Happy Meal toy with McPlayPower to unlock brand new games you can’t get anywhere else. Put together some friendly fun, with four fun-filled Puzzle Playgrounds from Hello Sanrio; and join the space battles of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles with Raphael’s TriceratonBattle, Michelangelo’s Race with Armaggon, Donatello’s Asteroid Blaster, and Leonardo’s Mothership Mission.
Have fun!

Scan your Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock brand new games you can’t get anywhere
else. Set the stage for fun with three new games from the new movie Sing – Race to the Show, Spot the Talent, and Silly Scenes.
 
Have fun!

Scan your Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock new games you can’t get anywhere else. Join the adolescent action of Teen Titans Go! with Dr. Light Laser Tag and Dr. Light Laser Hockey; or play Sweethearts games – Valentine Tap and Capture the Hearts.
 
Have fun!

Be a hero and scan your THE LEGO BATMAN MOVIE Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock amazing new Lego Batman games just in from Gotham City – Batwing Battle Test, Streets of Gotham City, Scale the Skyscraper, and Batarang Target Practice!

Have fun!

Scan your McDonald’s Happy Meal toy with McPlay Power to unlock new Barbie Fashionista and Hot Wheels games!

Announcing the All New McPlay arriving March 29th! Create a masterpiece, move to the music, launch a rocket and explore different worlds with Happy. Anything is possible in the all new McPlay. McPlay is constantly updated with new friends that are visiting the Happy Meal, so there’s always something new to make and do, including:

THE GAMES
Be an Inventor
This game encourages experimentation and creation. Assemble parts together and test the results until you get it just right!

Be an Artist Explore the techniques that make you feel like a real artist – with some surprising results. Drawing and painting with different tools and materials helps express creativity.

Be a Musician Match musical patterns to experience different sounds and rhythms. Then get moving to the music and compose your own songs!

Good to know
• No in-app purchases.
• No third-party advertising.
• Updated regularly with new games and characters. • You don't have to be connected to the internet to play McPlay. But you will need to be connected to the internet to install the app and receive content updates.

We hope you and your family enjoy the all new McPlay!

The Smurfs have arrived!
All-New Toy scanning
Kids scan their Happy Meal toys for surprise additional content!
Be an artist
Kids learn to draw Smurfette, watch her come to life and create their own scenes with art tools and Smurf stickers!
Be an inventor
Build a platform to rescue Clumsy, make a raft for Smurfette and bounce your way to safety in problem-solving challenges!
Be a musician
Play music with the Smurfs! Kids can play along on guitars, mushroom maracas and a musical merry-go-round.

The latest characters visiting the Happy Meal bring exciting new fun ways to play in Happy Studio. Watch out for new games and activities which help kids experiment and develop new skills. 
 
Super Mario

Kids get to find out about Mario, Luigi and their friends from The Mushroom Kingdom. They learn about Mario’s  ‘power ups’ and catch a glimpse of their world in our latest digital interactive book experience.

What's New
Beanie Boos arrive in McPlay!
 
All-new Toy scanning
Scan your Happy Meal toys for surprise challenges and content!

Be an inventor
Build a ramp to get Waddle across the glacier, and set sail with Bushy in these problem-solving challenges!

Be an artist
Draw Ollie and watch him come to life, as well as create your own Beanie Boo scenes with art tools and stickers!

Be a musician
Form a band with your Beanie Boo buddies and learn to play music with Twigs, Blizz and Spike!

What's New
Beanie Boos arrive in McPlay!
 
All-new Toy scanning
Scan your Happy Meal toys for surprise challenges and content!

Be an inventor
Build a ramp to get Waddle across the glacier, and set sail with Bushy in these problem-solving challenges!

Be an artist
Draw Ollie and watch him come to life, as well as create your own Beanie Boo scenes with art tools and stickers!

Be a musician
Form a band with your Beanie Boo buddies and learn to play music with Twigs, Blizz and Spike!

What’s New
Despicable Me 3 arrives in your all New McPlay app!

All-new toy scanning
Scan your Happy Meal toys to unlock surprise challenges and content.

Be an inventor
Three new activities. Use your Freeze Ray to stop Balthazar Bratt; use giant bubbles to capture a jewel; and customize Dru’s car to jump over a canyon. 
 
Be an artist
Draw a minion and watch it come to life. Also, create your own Despicable Me 3 scenes with art tools and stickers. And don’t forget the despicably fun coloring sheets.

Be a musician
Play Balthazar Bratt’s keytar and unlock a surprise by completing the music challenges.

What’s New?
September 5, 2017
 
Pete the Cat’s Got Class, Amelia Bedelia’s First Day of School and If You Take a Mouse to School arrive in McPlay!
 
All-new toy scanning
Scan your Happy Meal toys to unlock unique content.
 
Be an Artist
Draw a school bus then watch it pick up characters from the Happy Meal books on their way to school. Also create your own book inspired scenes with art tools and stickers.

The Holiday Express is now arriving at McPlay: kids can get on board for extra fun with their Happy Meal toy favorites.

Be an Artist with Barbie and Hot Wheels
Learn to draw Barbie’s Holiday Express train and watch it come to life, or draw a Hot Wheels car and watch it do a loopy stunt. Activities also include interactive coloring and sticker sheets to show off your creativity.

Be a Musician with The Minion Movie, Despicable Me 3, Sing and Secret Life of Pets
Play the Minion hand car instrument, the Despicable Me 3 locomotive music box, and the Sing harp car. Plus scan your Holiday Express Happy Meal toy for a Secret Life of Pets soundboard.

Be an Inventor with My Little Pony, Transformers, Ty Beanie Boo’s and Jurassic World
Use your problem-solving skills in brand new challenges: launch Rainbow Dash onto a snow-filled train car on the Holiday Express; customize Bumblebee, so he can jump a gap onto the Holiday Express; set the bridge so the Beanie Boo’s Ferris Wheel gets rolling; plus, scan your Holiday Express Happy Meal toy for a Jurassic World game that lets you launch a snowball to make a dinosaur roar!

WHAT’S NEW
American Greetings is arriving now at McPlay! Kids can scan their Happy Meal American Greetings Valentine’s Card to unlock the fun.
 
Be an Artist with American Greetings 
Learn to draw an adorable American Greetings creature and then watch it come to life right on your screen. Artist activities also include interactive coloring and sticker sheets to show off your creativity.

WHAT’S NEW
Update your app to join Snoopy and friends as they bring their imagination to McPlay with all new activities.

Be an Entertainer with Snoopy
Star in your own mini movie with Snoopy and Woodstock! You’re on a camping trip with Snoopy and you investigate a scary sound. What could it be?

Be an Artist with Snoopy
Learn to draw Snoopy and watch your drawing magically come to life. Plus, show your creativity with Snoopy coloring pages and stickers.

Be an Inventor with Snoopy
Solve all kinds of mini challenges with Snoopy and Woodstock. Can you add the right pieces to the contraption to land a bone in Snoopy’s dish? Add balloons to Snoopy’s dog house so that it floats up to Woodstock. Help Snoopy set up the court so he can bounce a basketball into the net!

Toy scan
Kids can scan their Snoopy Happy Meal toy to unlock fun surprises, challenges and even more content.

WHAT’S NEW

Peter Rabbit is now arriving at McPlay: kids can hop in for extra fun with their Happy Meal toy favorites.

Be an Artist with Peter Rabbit

Learn to draw Peter Rabbit and watch him come to life. Show off your creativity with interactive coloring, and enjoy sticker sheets featuring Jemima Puddleduck, Jeremy Fisher, Mrs. Tiddywinkle and more.

Be a Musician with Peter Rabbit

Play the Peter Rabbit instruments in Mr. McGregor’s garden. You can strum the garden shovel guitar, rattle the bird seed shaker and play with the hide and seek music box. Plus scan your Peter Rabbit Happy Meal toy for a brand new soundboard.

What's New
Check out the latest games on McPlay with your favourite characters!

All-new Toy scanning
Scan your Happy Meal toys for surprise challenges and even more content!
